name: Shorty Prototype
description:
I made this game about being a short person at a play. Some tall jackass is sitting in front of you and his fat fucking head is blocking your view.

Use arrow keys to move around the jerk's head, but jerk he is he will move to block your  view.

The bar up top tracks your progress through the play, and the bar on the side marks your anger. When your anger boils over, you will leave the play and lose the game.

Try your best to see the whole play to win!
